newsTiles.title: RSET Showcase at the US Embassy - London
newsTiles.body: Beyond showcasing RSETâ€™s cutting-edge capabilities, the event provided an opportunity to promote Kentucky on the global stage. Click to read more about this incredible opportunity.

newsTiles.title: Hands-On Training for Real-World Challenges
newsTiles.body: In February, RSET had the privilege of participating in the Emergency Management Response for Dynamic Populations training at the Ambipar Response Training Center in Pueblo, Colorado. NLEM pushes the boundaries of preparedness and response, equipping professionals with the tools and knowledge needed to tackle complex, large-scale incidents.
